text: Lezgival ( Lezgian : Лезгивал/Lezgiwal) is the Lezgin ethic code. It is a combination of Islam and Lezgin adats. The basis of Lezgiwal rules includes the importance of respect for elders and women, not bowing down to those who are stronger than themselves, compassion for the weak, honesty, honor and courage. A Lezgin's behavior towards the environment is always subject to this law, wherever he is. == References == Category:Lezgins
title: Lezgiwal
